title: Statistical paradoxes and omnibus tests
dc:creator: Alex Etz
description: I’ve been thinking about statistical paradoxes lately. They crop up all over the place, and they make for fun little puzzles. In this blog I’ll talk about two paradoxes that can occur when doing omnibus statistical tests. Relevant code is attached as a gist at the bottom of the page. 1) A common paradox There’s … Continue reading Statistical paradoxes and omnibus tests
